message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $130. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?

Bob, I understand you're working within a budget, and I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $120. This is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
